Anushka Sharma sends hearts to Virat Kohli after match-winning 100 Champions Trophy: Anushka Sharma praised Virat Kohli after the Indian batter scored an unbeaten 100 off 111 balls in the marquee clash against Pakistan on Sunday at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium.
